short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App Store Connect, automatically translates Name, Subtitle, Description and Keywords into the language of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you translate your app in App Store Connect, it's boring to copy and translate all the languages one by one, isn't it?

Now everything is very easy with this plugin. With DeepL you will be able to quickly translate quality translations.

All you need to do is add the plugin and open your app page.

Reminder: You need to open your DeepL account and create an API Key for yourself. After typing this Key into the plugin, you can use it as you wish.
